title: Enigma
description:
The famous (for a good reason) album by Enigma: MCMXC a.D.


VERY nice - not only to relax to, but also... well, really just in common a brilliant album. The mixture of the great beats and nature-sounding sounds... A lot like Buddha-bar (which you should, if you don&#039;t already, also listen a lot to. I MIGHT provide torrents for Buddha-bar another day.)

Anyway, you really should listen to this music, LISTEN, cause it&#039;s too good to have lived without.


So here&#039;s the track listing:


1. The Voice Of Enigma - 2:21
2. Principles Of Lust (Medley) - 11:43
3. Callas Went Away - 4:29
4. Mea Culpa - 5:01
5. The Voice And The Snake - 1:41
6. Knocking On Forbidden Doors - 4:22
7. Back To The Rivers Of Belief (Medley) - 10:36




I have NOT checked this for virus (well, I regularly scan my whole computer for virus, spyware etc.) - I don&#039;t need to. First of all, it&#039;s music, the most clean and simple thing in the world :) and secondly it comes from MY computer, and therefore you can simply be sure there is nothing in it.


This is my first torrent, so I hope I did everything right and that you will enjoy it ;P
